summary:
This is a complete re texture of the the Skyrim soul gems .

WHAT IT DOES>>>>>
what this mod does is it re textures the boring old soul gem textures to a more lore friendly and higher Detailed Resolution.

Sizes>>>>>

the textures are completely redone from scratch to the size of 1024x1024 resolution with matching detail. . 

Performance>>
descriptionHtml:
This is a complete re texture of the the Skyrim soul gems .

WHAT IT DOES>>>>>
what this mod does is it re textures the boring old soul gem textures to a more lore friendly and higher Detailed Resolution.

Sizes>>>>>

the textures are completely redone from scratch to the size of 1024x1024 resolution with matching detail. . 

Performance>>>>

this will have no impact on framerate what so ever. = no performance loss

Credits>>>> GameNinjaPro

Install>>>
NMM will handle it all for you :)

Future Updates>>>>

Will get round to redoing/retexturing all Gems in the game ..

ENDORESMENTS are welcome :)  If u like this retexture check out my other retextures http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5999 (Azuras Star Black and normal 2048 HQ Texture )
author: GameNinjaPro
